A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''January 24, 2010''', at 23:10 UTC.<ref group="note">The jar of this version is dated January 24, 2010 at 23:10 UTC.</ref><ref name="Forum">{{link|url=https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/archive/alpha/alpha-survival-single-player/796524-another-update?page=2|title=Ok, /indev/ appears to have been updated again within the last 20 minutes...|author=betasword|website=Minecraft Forum|date=January 24, 2010}}</ref> Its release was mentioned the day after in the announcement of the next Indev version's release.<ref>[[wordofnotch:353150540|Tile particle emittors, better explosions, and ads]] – The Word of Notch, January 25, 2010</ref>

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''General'''
* New particle effect for harvesting blocks.<ref group="note" name="gameplay">This has been verified by gameplay from this version's jar dated January 24, 2010 at 23:10 UTC.</ref>

'''[[Particles (Java Edition)|Particles]]'''
* Added a particle {{code|bubble}}.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Bedrock JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Bedrock]]'''
* Blast resistance now equals 6,000,000.

'''[[File:Chest JE1.png|32px]] [[Chest]]s'''
* The player can no longer make triple chests.<ref name="Forum2">{{link|url=https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/archive/alpha/alpha-survival-single-player/796524-another-update?page=2|title=You can no longer make 3 chests. :sad.gif:|author=dehodson|website=Minecraft Forum|date=January 24, 2010}}</ref>

'''[[File:TNT JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[TNT]]'''
* Explosions lose power when going through stronger materials.<ref group="note" name="gameplay" />
* Now produce smoke particles again.<ref name="Forum3">{{link|url=https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/archive/alpha/alpha-survival-single-player/796524-another-update?page=2|title=HOLY! smouldering to the tnt!!! explode a tnt and watch the dust fly!|author=gigaman|website=Minecraft Forum|date=January 24, 2010}}</ref>
* Now deals more damage.<ref name="Forum1">{{link|url=https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/archive/alpha/alpha-survival-single-player/796524-another-update?page=2|title=TNT seems to kill you a lot more.|author=Ladon|website=Minecraft Forum|date=January 24, 2010}}</ref>
* No longer destroys blocks when ignited in water or lava.{{verify|Based off this post: https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/archive/alpha/alpha-survival-single-player/796525-new-features-in-indev I'm assuming that this was added in in-124-2}}

'''[[File:Torch JE3 BE1.png|32px]] [[File:Wall Torch (S) JE3.png|32px]] [[Torch]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Torch JE2.png|32px]] [[File:Wall Torch JE2.png|32px]]
** Shrank hitbox.{{verify|type=change|edition=java|could be the previous version}}
** Added a top texture.{{Verify|could be the previous version|edition=java|type=change}}

=== Items ===
'''General'''
* The player can no longer drop whole stacks of items, and must instead drop one at a time.<ref group="note" name="gameplay" />
* Items now get destroyed by fire and lava.{{verify|Could have been added as early as in-111-1}}

'''[[File:Bow JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Bow]]s'''
* Now use [[arrow]]s when firing.<ref group="note" name="gameplay" />
* Firing an arrow underwater creates bubble particles.

=== World generation ===
'''[[File:Starting House JE1.png|40px]] [[Starting house]]'''
* Now contains an extra [[chest]] with TNT in it.<ref name="Forum"/>

'''World'''
* All air directly above bedrock layer is turned into lava.{{verify|Could be as early as in-111-1}}

== Bugs ==
'''1 bug reported'''
* Game crashes during generating world when player is offline.
